info.title: NPS POPBO External API Service
info.description: External API service for NPS POPBO integration with third-party services including Signzy, Protean, PRAN, PAN validation, and CKYC services

get.description: Returns the health status of the service

post.description: Submit pension details to generate a new PRAN (Permanent Retirement Account Number)

get.description:
Track the status of PRAN generation using reference ID

**Example curl command:**
```bash
curl --location 'http://localhost:3011/api/v1/popbo-externalApi/trackStatus?refId=2084949' \
--header 'x-api-key: 616a21cf-0a6e-462d-b292-f7a6baa6d9c0'
```

parameters.name: refId
parameters.description: Reference ID from PRAN generation response

get.description:
Track the status of subscriber registration using responseId and ackId

**Example curl command:**
```bash
curl --location 'http://localhost:3011/api/v1/popbo-externalApi/trackStatusSubReg?responseId=1211197&ackId=' \
--header 'x-api-key: 616a21cf-0a6e-462d-b292-f7a6baa6d9c0'
```

post.summary: Get Subscriber Details with Dynamic Credential Override
post.description:
Get subscriber details with automatic credential override from database based on popRegNo header.

**Key Features:**
- Auto-overrides userId with SUBSCRIBER_USER_ID from database (replaces BO with WS)
- Works even without userId in request body
- Uses credentials based on x-pop-reg-no header
- Sets NA values when database records not found
- Logs all outbound headers for verification

**Available x-pop-reg-no values:**
- `5000111`: Default credentials (used when header not provided)
- `5000332`: Test credentials with userId 1300342BO â†’ 1300342WS
- `5000870`: Alternative test credentials
- `9999999`: Non-existent (returns NA values)

**Credential Override Priority:**
1. Database SUBSCRIBER_USER_ID (highest priority)
2. Request body userId (fallback)
3. Empty string (when neither available)

parameters.name: x-pop-reg-no
parameters.description: POP Registration Number for database credential lookup. If not provided, defaults to 5000111. Available values: 5000111 (default), 5000332 (test), 5000870 (alternative), 9999999 (non-existent for testing NA values)

Check PRAN eligibility for contribution with various parameters. All authentication headers are handled internally via environment variables or configuration.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid OTP or request parameters

get.description:
Processes the DigiLocker OAuth callback after user authorization. This endpoint is PUBLIC and does not require API key authentication.

**Example curl command:**
```bash
curl --location 'https://uat-pop2.proteanx.io/api-gateway/externalapi/api/v1/digilocker/getDigiKycDetails?code=YOUR_AUTH_CODE&state=YOUR_STATE&docName=Aadhaar%20Card'
```

message.example: KYC data fetched and stored successfully

get.description:
Downloads and parses KYC XML data from file management service and returns structured JSON response. Can accept either a reference number or file ID.

**Example curl command:**
```bash
curl --location 'https://uat-pop2.proteanx.io/api-gateway/externalapi/api/v1/digilocker/getKycData/cea6236a-4d7a-46e4-80e3-17205e1e6cb1' \
--header 'x-api-key: 616a21cf-0a6e-462d-b292-f7a6baa6d9c0'
```

200.description: Successfully retrieved and parsed KYC data

post.description:
Check if a PRAN is eligible for contributions

**Example curl command:**
```bash
curl --location 'http://localhost:3011/api/v1/protean/contribution/checkPRANContributionEligibility' \
--header 'x-api-key: 616a21cf-0a6e-462d-b292-f7a6baa6d9c0' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data '{
    "popUsrType": "CORPORATE",
    "pran": "110179506060"
}'
```
Get the status of a PRAN account

Check PRAN eligibility for contribution with external service

**Example curl command:**
```bash
curl --location 'http://localhost:3011/api/v1/subscriber/contribution/checkpraneligibility' \
--header 'x-api-key: 616a21cf-0a6e-462d-b292-f7a6baa6d9c0' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data '{
    "batchId": "BATCH123",
    "pran": "110179506060",
    "tierType": "T1",
    "userId": "USER001",
    "month": "12",
    "year": "2024",
    "contributionType": "VOLUNTARY",
    "upldBy": "SYSTEM",
    "subscriberContribution": "5000",
    "employerContribution": "5000",
    "branchRegNo": "BR001",
    "receiptNumber": "REC001",
    "pfmId": "PFM001",
    "receiptGenerateFlag": "Y",
    "upldId": "UPL001"
}'
```

ApiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key
ApiKeyAuth.description: Click 'Authorize' button and enter this API key: 616a21cf-0a6e-462d-b292-f7a6baa6d9c0

PopRegNoAuth.name: x-pop-reg-no
PopRegNoAuth.description: POP Registration Number for credential lookup. Available values: 5000111 (default), 5000332, 5000870, 9999999. If not provided, defaults to 5000111.

mobileNumber.description: Mobile number of the account holder

idType.description: ID type - C for PAN, A for Aadhaar, V for VID, U for UID

contributionType.description: Contribution type - U for User, E for Employer

upldBy.description: Uploaded by - U for User, E for Employer

receiptGenerateFlag.description: Receipt generate flag - Y for Yes, N for No

userId.description: User ID (optional, will be populated from environment if not provided)

contributionRecGen.description: Contribution receipt generation details (for requestType: 12). Either this or subRegistrationRecGenForm must be provided.

subRegistrationRecGenForm.description: Subscription registration receipt generation details (for requestType: 11). Either this or contributionRecGen must be provided.

address.example: 101-104 TULSIANI CHAMBERSFREE PRESS JOURNAL MARGNARIMAN POINTMUMBAI MAHARASHTRA 400 021

uidType.description: UID Type - A for Aadhaar, U for UID

reqType.description: Request Type - S for Send OTP, V for Verify OTP
